data.title: The CRMP Family of Proteins and Their Role in Sema3A Signaling
data.meta_description: The CRMP proteins were originally identified as mediators of Sema3A signaling and neuronal differentiation. Much has been learned about the mechanism by which CRMPs regulate cellular responses to Sema3A. In this review, the evidence for CRMP as a component of the...
